text: Carlos Sanchez Ezquerra (12 November 1947 - 1 October 2018) was a Spanish comics artist. He worked mainly in British comics and lived in Andorra. He was best known as the co-creator of Judge Dredd. Ezquerra died on 1 October 2018 from lung cancer at the age of 70.Judge Dredd co-creator Carlos Ezquerra dies aged 70, in The Guardian, 1 October 2018Muere el dibujante zaragozano Carlos Ezquerra, co-creador de 'Judge Dredd' ==References== ==Other websites== *Carlos Ezquerra at Comic Vine * Category:Spanish artists Category:Spanish comics artists Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:1947 births Category:2018 deaths
title: Carlos Ezquerra
